text: Alto Reed (born Thomas Neal Cartmell, May 16, 1948 â€“ December 30, 2020) was an American saxophonist. He was best known as a long-time member of Bob Seger and the Silver Bullet Band. He also was a member of the Grand Funk Railroad. Reed was born in Detroit, Michigan. His career began in 1972. Reed died of problems caused by colon cancer in Detroit on December 30, 2020. He was 72 years old. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:American jazz musicians Category:American rock musicians Category:American pop musicians Category:American funk musicians Category:American saxophonists Category:Musicians from Detroit
title: Alto Reed
